summary: An Ebony-inspired Mage robe, modified from thalmor robes.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small plugin that adds new robes, modified from the Thalmor Robes to have accents that match ebony armor. It\'s a small reskin that i wanted for myself since i love the ebony armor, and wanted a mage variant.

The Robe is in a chest in helgen Keep, next to the cell holding the dead mage in the torturer\'s area.

you\'ll find 2 robes and 2 hoods in the chest, along with other loot. They are unenchanted for balancing and your own customization.

Both male and female versions done.

Enjoy!

Install;
extract contents of Data folder in this zip, into the Data folder in your Skyrim folder.
author: Dreighton
